Title: Relates to the process for the selection of fiscal intermediary services contractors for the consumer directed personal assistance program; repealer
Summary: Relates to the process for the selection of fiscal intermediary services contractors for the consumer directed personal assistance program; repeals provisions relating to certain surveys and to the award of contracts; provides for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof.
LawCode: Amd §365-f, rpld §365-f sub 4-a ¶¶(b-2) & (b-3), Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to the process for the selection of fiscal intermediary services contractors for the consumer directed personal assistance program; to repeal paragraphs (b-2) and (b-3) of subdivision 4-a of section 365-f of the social services law relating to certain surveys and to the award of contracts; and providing for the repeal of certain provisions upon the expiration thereof
